Class WordFrequencyProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • WordFrequencyProcessor

  • public class WordFrequencyProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This program reads an input file, parses it into word tokens, count the number of occurrence of each word and print them in descending order.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordFrequencyProcessor()
      Default constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<WordFrequency> getFrequency()
      Returns the list of WordFrequency.
      void readFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      This function reads file line by line, parse each line to get word tokens and put token into map.
